name: ククタン(kukutan)
description:
Kukutan is an 8-bit side-scrolling action where a boy and karakasa explore a dungeon, 

hit, grab, shake, jump and fly to reach the goal.

「ククタン」は、少年と唐傘がダンジョンを探検し、

叩いて掴んで振るって跳んで飛んでゴールを目指す、8bit横スクロールACTです！

Browser version description

The content is almost the same as the download version,  but The download version has a little bonus elements after clearing the main story.

Story

The boy was brought up by tsukumo, an autonomous tool, such as the karakasa on his back. The two who continue their journey today see a mysterious sight in the land they arrived at. There is a space where the times and places are disturbed, and tsukumo people gather and wander...

Feeling the anomaly of the tsukumo people who are similar to the parents who raised them, the boy grasps the Kara umbrella and jumps in

What is the answer that awaits you ...「IZA!」

System

Movement includes walking and jumping, as well as gliding and wall climbing with the help of a karakasa.

In addition to hitting with a karakasa, the enemy's tsukumo can be itemized by defeating it once, and by grabbing it and shaking it, you can launch an attack according to the original enemy's ability.

3 life. Hair color and sound effects change with each damage.

Please note that if you jump out of the screen, it will fail.

Items will disappear in a certain amount of time if not picked up.

If you sleep completely, you will recover 1 life.

How to play

Wait a moment on the title and the tutorial start.

←→: Move left and right

Ｚ: Attack　Ｘ: Jump

Ｘ->(Touching the side of the wall)Ｘ: With wall

(Sticking to the wall)Ｘ: Wall Jump 

Ｘ->(Again in the air)Ｘ: Gliding

While touching the enemy (item) after defeating,

↑: Pick up item　↓: Put item

With the item picked up,

Ｚ: Shake item　Ｘ: Jump

to press nothing for a while―――
